contexts.context: ...start. Luckily, teaching, reviewing and miscellaneous <mark>annoyances</mark> keep the mind elsewhere. One of those miscellaneous annoyances...
...annoyances keep the mind elsewhere. One of those miscellaneous <mark>annoyances</mark> was a move from my old flat to another...
...arrangements was not proceeding smoothly. The mayor looked <mark>annoyed</mark>, Frau Seitz looked worried and Mrs Clark bewildered...
